The Vaccines and Medications in Pregnancy Surveillance System (VAMPSS) is a new nationwide post-marketing surveillance system established to comprehensively monitor […] Filed Under:Reproductive System,Vaccine Adverse Events,Vaccine Marketing,Vaccine Politics/People,VAMPSSTagged With:drugs during pregnancy,immunizations,vaccinations,Vaccine Adverse Reactions,VAMPSS **Felicia from Maine** Creating an HPV Industry File a VAERS Report Gardasil and Unexplained Deaths HPV Industry Timeline HPV Mechanisms of Action in Women HPV Vaccine Fact Sheet Petition: Rescind HPV Vaccine Approval Presentation to the FDA Supreme Court Arguments **HPV Vaccine VAERS Reports** Access expanded report here.
